# Overview

__fgeo__ installs and loads multiple R packages in a single step. Get started with:

```{r}
# install.packages("remotes")
# remotes::install_github("fgeo")
library(fgeo)
```

Search packages and functions below, and click the links to learn more.

## Packages

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
fgeo::fgeo_index_packages() %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(package = fgeo_link(package)) %>% 
  DT::datatable(escape = FALSE)
```

## Functions by package

```{r, echo=FALSE}
fgeo::fgeo_index_functions() %>% 
  # Make clickable links
  dplyr::mutate(fun = fgeo_link(package, fun)) %>% 
  DT::datatable(escape = FALSE)
```
